line.words: Vwayaje nan Lemond antye.

subtitle.line: Around the World.
Around the World.

line.words: Yon maten Emil reveye kòm dabitid. Emil renmen woutin li yo. Li toujou bay chat li a manje lè maten. Men jou maten sa a, te gen yon bagay ki pa t nan plas li!

subtitle.line: One morning Emil wakes up as usual. Emil likes his routines. He always feeds his cat in the morning. But this morning something is wrong!
One morning Emil wakes up as usual. Emil likes his routines. He always feeds his cat in the morning. But this morning something is wrong!

line.words: Chat li a pa t la! Emil gade tout kote, men li pa ka jwenn chat l. E lè sa a, li wè yon mesaj sou tab kizin nan.

subtitle.line: His cat is not there! Emil looks everywhere but cannot find his cat. Then he sees a note on the kitchen table.
His cat is not there! Emil looks everywhere but cannot find his cat. Then he sees a note on the kitchen table.

line.words: Mesaj la di §Si ou vle Chat ou a tounen fòk ou vwayaje nan lemond antye epi ranmase 3 endikasyon. Ou dwe kòmanse an Frans. Chache yon moun ki sou wout nan lekòl li nan chak peyi ou vizite.§

subtitle.line: The note says §If you want your cat back you have to travel around the world and collect 3 clues. You must start in France. Look for someone on their way to school in each country you visit.§
The note says §If you want your cat back you have to travel around the world and collect 3 clues. You must start in France. Look for someone on their way to school in each country you visit.§

line.words: Emil renmen Chat li a, li kòmanse mare paket li menm kote a. Manman li mande l §Kisa ki ou ap fè la doudou?§ Emil di §Mwen pral vwayaje nan lemond antye pou m ka sove Chat m an.§

subtitle.line: Emil loves his cat, and starts packing straight away. §What are you doing darling?§ Asks his mum. §I’m going on a trip around the world to save my cat§ Emil says.
Emil loves his cat, and starts packing straight away. §What are you doing darling?§ Asks his mum. §I’m going on a trip around the world to save my cat§ Emil says.

line.words: Manman li di §Oke doudou. Pa bliye bwòs adan ou!§

subtitle.line: §OK darling. Don’t forget to brush your teeth!§ Says his mum.
§OK darling. Don’t forget to brush your teeth!§ Says his mum.

line.words: Emil jwenn paspò li. Li mete li nan valiz li.

subtitle.line: Emil finds his passport. He puts it in his bag.
Emil finds his passport. He puts it in his bag.

line.words: Emil jwenn lajan li. Li mete li nan valiz li.

subtitle.line: Emil finds his money. He puts it in his bag.
Emil finds his money. He puts it in his bag.

line.words: Emil jwenn foutbòl li. Li mete li nan valiz li.

subtitle.line: Emil finds his football. He puts it in his bag.
Emil finds his football. He puts it in his bag.

line.words: Emil jwenn telefòn papa li. Li mete li nan valiz li.

subtitle.line: Emil finds his dad’s telephone. He puts it in his bag.
Emil finds his dad’s telephone. He puts it in his bag.

line.words: Li ale sou òdinatè li epi li rezève yon tikè. Li prale an La frans, epi Mali ak Matinik.

subtitle.line: He goes to the computer and reserves a ticket. He is going to France, then Mali and then Martinique.
He goes to the computer and reserves a ticket. He is going to France, then Mali and then Martinique.

line.words: Li kite lakay li. Li di §Babay manman!§ Manman li reponn §baybay doudou! M swete w pase yon bon jounen nan lekòl ou a.§

subtitle.line: He leaves his house. §Bye mum!§ he calls. §Bye darling! Have a nice day at school.§ His mum says.
He leaves his house. §Bye mum!§ he calls. §Bye darling! Have a nice day at school.§ His mum says.

line.words: Li ale nan ayewopò epi li pran tikè l.

subtitle.line: He goes to the airport and collects his ticket.
He goes to the airport and collects his ticket.

line.words: Li monte nan avyon an. Kè li te sou biskèt, men li te trè kontan.

subtitle.line: He gets on the plane. He is nervous, but very excited.
He gets on the plane. He is nervous, but very excited.

line.words: Avyon ateri nan ayewopò Paris. Ayewopò a rele 'Chal de Gol'. Aprè sa, Emil pran metro pou l al lavil.

subtitle.line: The plane lands at the airport in Paris. The airport is called ‘Charles de Gaule.’ Then Emil goes by metro into the city.
The plane lands at the airport in Paris. The airport is called ‘Charles de Gaule.’ Then Emil goes by metro into the city.

line.words: Emil gade toupatou. Li sezi lè li wè rivyè a ak pon yo. Li di §Gade yo!§ Gen yon moun ki t ap pase ki di §Yo rele sa a Pon nèf.§

subtitle.line: Emil looks around. He is amazed at the river and the bridges. §Look at them!§ he says. §That one is called Pont Neuf§ says a passerby.
Emil looks around. He is amazed at the river and the bridges. §Look at them!§ he says. §That one is called Pont Neuf§ says a passerby.

line.words: Menm kote a, li wè yon ti gason ki ta pral lekòl. §Bonjou! Kijan ou al lekòl?§ Ti gason an di §Wi, m ale sou bekann. Mwen gen yon bagay pou ou.§ Ti gason an bay Emil yon foto dechire epi li pedale al fè wout li.

subtitle.line: Then he sees a boy on his way to school. §Hello! Are you going to school?§ §Yes§ says the boy. §I go by bike. I have something for you.§ The boy gives Emil a torn photograph and rides off.
Then he sees a boy on his way to school. §Hello! Are you going to school?§ §Yes§ says the boy. §I go by bike. I have something for you.§ The boy gives Emil a torn photograph and rides off.

line.words: Emil met foto dechire nan valiz li ak anpil prekosyon, li tounen nan estasyon metwo a pou l ale nan ayewopò a. Lòt eskal se Mali!

subtitle.line: Emil puts the torn photograph carefully into his bag, goes to the metro station and goes by metro to the airport. Next stop Mali!
Emil puts the torn photograph carefully into his bag, goes to the metro station and goes by metro to the airport. Next stop Mali!

line.words: Apre yon vòl long Emil rive nan ayewopò kapital peyi Mali a, Bamako. Se yon gran vil, ki gen anpil moun epi li fè cho.

subtitle.line: After a long flight Emil arrives at the airport in the capital of Mali, Bamako. The city is big, crowded and hot.
After a long flight Emil arrives at the airport in the capital of Mali, Bamako. The city is big, crowded and hot.

line.words: Emil pran yon kamyonèt nan vil la. Li di §Poukisa yo rele vil sa Bamako?§ Yon madam di §Bamako vle di 'Larivyè kwokodil' nan lang lokal nou an ki se Bambara.§

subtitle.line: Emil takes a bus into the city. §Why is this city called Bamako?§ he says.§Bamako means ‘crocodile river’ in our local language Bambara§ says a lady.
Emil takes a bus into the city. §Why is this city called Bamako?§ he says.§Bamako means ‘crocodile river’ in our local language Bambara§ says a lady.

line.words: Madanm nan di §O Mali nou pale fransè epitou Bamabara.§

subtitle.line: §In Mali we speak French as well as Bambara.§ says the lady.
§In Mali we speak French as well as Bambara.§ says the lady.

line.words: Menm kote a, Emil wè yon ti fi k’ap pase. Li gen yon inifòm lekòl sou li.

subtitle.line: Then Emil sees a girl walking past. She has a school uniform on.
Then Emil sees a girl walking past. She has a school uniform on.

line.words: §Bonjou! Eske e lekòo ou pral la?§ Ti fi a di §Wi. Mwen pral lekòl nan taksi. Mwen gen yon bagay pou ou.§ Ti fi a bay Emil yon lòt foto dechire epi l al fè wout li.

subtitle.line: §Hello! Are you going to school?’§ Yes says the girl. §I walk to school. I have something for you.§ The girl gives Emil another torn photograph and walks off.
§Hello! Are you going to school?’§ Yes says the girl. §I walk to school. I have something for you.§ The girl gives Emil another torn photograph and walks off.

line.words: Emil mete foto dechire nan valiz li ak anpil prekosyon, li ale nan estasyon kamyonèt la epi li pran yon kamyonèt pou li ale ayewopò. Pwochen eskal se Martinique!

subtitle.line: Emil puts the torn photograph carefully into his bag, goes to the bus stop and goes by bus to the airport. Next stop Martinique!
Emil puts the torn photograph carefully into his bag, goes to the bus stop and goes by bus to the airport. Next stop Martinique!

line.words: Apre yon ti vòl, Emil rive nan ayewopò Martinik. Li pran yon taksi pou l ale nan kapitàl la, Fò de Frans. Pou li desann taksi a, fòk li rele §Kanpe!§

subtitle.line: After a short flight Emil arrives at the airport in Martinique. He takes a taxico to the capital, Fort-de-France. To stop the taxico he has to shout §Stop§
After a short flight Emil arrives at the airport in Martinique. He takes a taxico to the capital, Fort-de-France. To stop the taxico he has to shout §Stop§

line.words: Fò de Frans fè cho epi gen anpil moun, men li pi piti ke Bamako. Li bò lanmè a.

subtitle.line: Fort-de-France is hot and busy, but smaller than Bamako. It is on the coast.
Fort-de-France is hot and busy, but smaller than Bamako. It is on the coast.

line.words: Nan yon ti pak Emil wè kèk mesye yo k ap jwe enstriman mizik. Li koute mizik y ap jwe a.

subtitle.line: In a little park Emil sees some men playing instruments. He listens to the music.
In a little park Emil sees some men playing instruments. He listens to the music.

line.words: §Mizik la anfòm!§ Li mande §Ki mizik sa a ye?§ Youn nan mesye yo di §Sa rele Zouk – li trè popilè bò isit la!§

subtitle.line: §The music is fantastic! What is it?§ he asks. §It is called Zouk – it is very popular here!§ says one of the men.
§The music is fantastic! What is it?§ he asks. §It is called Zouk – it is very popular here!§ says one of the men.

line.words: Epi Emil wè yon ti fi k’ap pase nan yon taksi. Li gen yon inifòm lekòl sou li epi cheve l trese.

subtitle.line: Then Emil sees a girl passing in a taxico. She has a school uniform on and plaits in her hair.
Then Emil sees a girl passing in a taxico. She has a school uniform on and plaits in her hair.

line.words: §Bonjou! Eske se lekòl ou pral la?§ Ti fi a di §Wi. M al lekòl nan taksi. Mwen gen yon bagay pou ou.§ Ti fi a bay Emil yon lòt foto dechire epi l al fè wout li.

subtitle.line: §Hello! Are you going to school?§ §Yes§ says the girl. §I go to school by taxixo. I have something for you.§ The girl gives Emil another torn photograph and rides away.
§Hello! Are you going to school?§ §Yes§ says the girl. §I go to school by taxixo. I have something for you.§ The girl gives Emil another torn photograph and rides away.

line.words: Emil di §Li lè pou mwen al lakay mwen!§ Li pran yon taksi pou l ale nan ayewopò a– epi li pran avyon pou l al lakay li.

subtitle.line: §Time to go home!§ Says Emil. He goes to the airport by taxi – and goes home by plane.
§Time to go home!§ Says Emil. He goes to the airport by taxi – and goes home by plane.

line.words: Nan avyon an Emil retire 3 mòso foto dechire yo. Lè li kole yo ansanm li gen foto an antye. Li gade foto a byen.

subtitle.line: On the aeroplane Emil takes out the 3 torn pieces of photograph. They match up like a puzzle! He looks carefully at the picture.
On the aeroplane Emil takes out the 3 torn pieces of photograph. They match up like a puzzle! He looks carefully at the picture.

line.words: Foto fi a. Se vwazin li Juanita!

subtitle.line: The picture is of a girl. it’s his neighbour Juanita!
The picture is of a girl. it’s his neighbour Juanita!

line.words: Li ale lakay Juanita dirèk lè li soti nan ayewopò a. Juanita fèk sot lekòl. §Bonjou Emil! Chat ou a la a, wi!§

subtitle.line: He goes straight to Juanita’s house from the airport. She is back from school. §Hi Emil! Your cat is here!§
He goes straight to Juanita’s house from the airport. She is back from school. §Hi Emil! Your cat is here!§

line.words: Emil te byen kontan. Li tounen lakay li avèk chat li a. Manman li di §Bonjour doudou, kijan lekòl la te ye?§

subtitle.line: Emil is very happy. He goes home with his cat. §Hello darling§ says his mum. §How was school?§
Emil is very happy. He goes home with his cat. §Hello darling§ says his mum. §How was school?§
